lead_paragraph: There's a contradictory mission for rowers competing in this year's Summer Olympics. Get into your boat, work your hardest — but try to avoid the water.

headline.print_headline: In Rio's Olympic Water, It's All About Avoiding the Splash
headline.main: In Rio's Olympic Water, It's All About Avoiding the Splash

snippet: There's a contradictory mission for rowers competing in this year's Summer Olympics. Get into your boat, work your hardest — but try to avoid the water....
